contrib.xpoll.app.title=Polls contrib.xpoll.finish.message=Vote is finished. Here are the results: contrib.xpoll.home.title=Polls contrib.xpoll.notVoted=You haven't voted yet contrib.xpoll.numberVotes=Scores contrib.xpoll.preparation.hasRight=This xpoll is currently in preparation, click "edit" to modify it and activate it. contrib.xpoll.preparation.noRight=This xpoll is currently in preparation, you do not have the rights to modify it. contrib.xpoll.status.active=Active contrib.xpoll.status.finished=Finished contrib.xpoll.status.inPreparation=In preparation contrib.xpoll.user=Users contrib.xpoll.vote.failed=Failed to save the document. Reason: {0} contrib.xpoll.vote.failed.forbidden=Not allowed to vote! contrib.xpoll.vote.guest.submit=Save contrib.xpoll.vote.user.submit=Save contrib.xpoll.vote.saved=Saved contrib.xpoll.vote.saving=Saving... contrib.xpoll.vote.select=Select a value contrib.xpoll.WebHome.description=Welcome to the XWiki Poll Application. You can create a poll for your internal needs. contrib.xpoll.WebHome.name=Name contrib.xpoll.WebHome.status=Status contrib.xpoll.WebHome.winner=Winner
## Class properties XPoll.XPollClass_description=Description XPoll.XPollClass_description_emptyvalue=There is no description XPoll.XPollClass_name=Name XPoll.XPollClass_proposals=Proposals XPoll.XPollClass_proposals_hint=(Comma or pipe separated list) XPoll.XPollClass_status=Status XPoll.XPollClass_status_active=Active XPoll.XPollClass_status_finished=Finished XPoll.XPollClass_status_hint=Shows the stage of this poll XPoll.XPollClass_status_inpreparation=In preparation XPoll.XPollClass_type_hint=A poll can be configured to require only one or multiple values XPoll.XPollClass_type_multi=Allow multiple options XPoll.XPollClass_type_single=Can select a single option XPoll.XPollClass_type_condorcet=Allow multiple options in order
## Migration
xpoll.migration.shouldMigrateOne=This poll is incompatible with the new version of the XWiki Poll Application. xpoll.migration.migrate=If you wish to fix this issue, follow the link below. xpoll.migration.notifyAdmin=Please notify the administrator with regards to this issue. xpoll.migration.linkText=Click here to migrate. xpoll.migration.migrated=Migrated xpoll.migration.shouldMigrateAll=There are polls that are incompatible with the new version of the XWiki Poll Application. xpoll.migration.failed=Migration Failed! xpoll.migration.inProgress=Migrating
